transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji sir, abhi aawaz aa rahi hai? Abhi call forward kiya tha.
Customer: Haan, hum log video meeting connect kar rahe hain. Ek baar screen bataiyega dekh aake, theek hai? Udhar aapki ye cheezein improve kara dunga abhi, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, aap dekhiye aapke registered mail pe aapko video meeting ka link aaya hoga.
Customer: Theek hai.



Executive: Mil gaya?
Customer: Sir, mail bheja kya?
Executive: Hmm, mail bhej diya sir.
Customer: Nahi aaya mail.

Executive: Aapne jo IndiaMART pe mail diya hai na sir, usi pe.
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute. Haan, refresh kar lo ek baar.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kya apna hai? Khotmansi4657@gmail.com. Last time bhi isi pe hi kara tha maine.
Customer: Haan.

Customer: Aa gaya na call?
(Silence)
Customer: Aap jya vyaktishi bolat aahat, tyanni aapla call hold var thevla aahe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive the video meeting link.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the mail was sent.
- Executive asked customer to refresh the mail.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, mail, registered mail
